protocol.text: The raw probe intensities were normalized using the GC-robust multiarray averaging (GCRMA) package ID_REF =  VALUE = GCRMA
Protoplast supsensions treated sequentially with 20mM KNO3 and NH4NO3 for 1h40min, 35uM cycloheximide for 20m, 10uM dexamethasone for 5h, 1.5mM 4tU and 0.2mM uracil for 20min.

Wild-type Arabidopsis thaliana seeds were grown on vertical agar plates containing 2.2g/L MS salts without N or C, 1% (w/v) sucrose, 0.5g/L MES sodium salt, 1mM KNO3 and 2% (w/v) agar under a 50umol/m2s and 16h light/8h dark regime at 22 deg C.
RNA extraction was performed using an RNeasy Micro Kit with RNase-free DNaseI Set (QIAGEN) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
4tuU pull down RNA fractions were amplified and labeled with Ovation Pico WTA System V2 (NuGEN) and Encore Biotin Module (NuGEN) according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Following fragmentation, 5 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 18 hr at 45Â°C on GeneChip Arabidopsis Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner (Affymetrix)
